name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **Full-stack Development**, focusing on **Software Design** and **Software Development**. Proficient in **AI** technologies and building scalable algorithms for applications, particularly within the healthcare and financial industries. Expert in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with extensive hands-on experience utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for creating high-performance applications.

Demonstrated success in implementing **Fraud Detection** systems and developing cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure** while employing microservices and event-driven architectures. Adept at deploying CI/CD pipelines and fostering **Process Improvement** through innovative solutions.

Strong technical leadership skills combined with effective **communication** and **team player** capabilities promote successful **Product Collaboration** and enhance **Customer Support Stack**. Proficient in MLOps, with extensive experience in model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Proven ability to identify and resolve complex problems, driving efficiency and continuous improvement in all projects.

• Implemented comprehensive **MLOps** workflows with **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow**, streamlining the model training and deployment processes, and reducing time-to-production by **35%**.
• Integrated intelligent features into frontend applications, including personalized dashboards powered by models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**, improving user engagement metrics by **25%**.
• Developed **DevOps pipelines** using **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps** with thorough test automation, achieving a code quality pass rate of **98%** across multiple environments.
• Enhanced data visualization capabilities with tools such as **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling real-time insights into financial activities and operational KPIs, resulting in improved decision-making speed by **30%**.

• Defined and enforced thorough testing strategies across the software stack using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, and **PyTest**, achieving a 100% test coverage across critical components.
• Integrated advanced search functionalities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, facilitating rapid querying across diverse health and financial datasets, with latency reduction of **50%**.

- Leveraged expertise in **Software Development** and **Fraud Detection** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for **high-volume transactional systems**.
- Utilized **Full-stack Development** skills to build interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
- Applied **AI** techniques to deliver real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**—providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, improving efficiency by **30%**.
- Engineered a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance, benefiting transactions that increased by **25%** during peak periods.
- Designed and developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, reducing data ingestion time by **40%**.
- Created and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, leading to a **15%** decrease in fraudulent transactions.
- Developed ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, enhancing decision-making processes.

• Led the design and development of AI-driven features, leveraging **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to enhance user experience and personalize product listings for over **1M active users**.
• Architected scalable backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, achieving **99.9% uptime** and consistently low latency across key modules including checkout and order fulfillment.
• Developed full-stack applications with **React (18)** and **Vue 3**, ensuring responsive design and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1) for **500K+ daily visitors**.
• Optimized customer support workflows by implementing event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating real-time inventory tracking and order updates, which reduced support response times by **30%**.
• Enhanced data management strategies using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, enabling rapid data retrieval and performance improvements, supporting over **200K transactions per day**.
• Spearheaded the use of feature flags and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, allowing for smooth implementation of new features and reducing deployment risks during updates by **40%**.
• Integrated secure payment processes with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring **PCI compliance** and safeguarding sensitive customer data during financial transactions.
• Collaborated with product teams to identify opportunities for process improvement, translating complex technical concepts into actionable insights and enhancing communication across departments.
• Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for enhanced security, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection throughout the platform.
• Actively participated in code reviews and mentorship, fostering a culture of continuous learning and technical leadership among engineering team members.
